name: candombed
description: TypeScript project editor infrastructure based on monaco-editor easily to deploy 100% in the browser as static page.

scripts.bundle-src: npm run tsc && npm run copy-projects-json  && browserify dist/src/main.js --debug -x typescript -x monaco-editor -t brfs -o static/candombed/src.js
scripts.dev-prepare: rm -rf static dist ; npm run tsc ; npm run cp-static; npm run bundle-src
scripts.dev: concurrently --kill-others "npm run watchify" "npm run tsc-watch" "npm run browser-sync" "npm run watch-static"
scripts.all: rm -rf dist static docs; npm run tsc && npm run copy-projects-json && npm run cp-static  && npm run bundle-src && npm run minify-src && npm run bundle-src && npm run minify-src && mv static docs
scripts.all-no-minify: rm -rf dist static docs ../docs/candombed; npm run tsc && npm run copy-projects-json && npm run cp-static && npm run bundle-src && npm run minify-src && npm run bundle-src && mv static ../docs/candombed

author: Sebastian Gurin
